Posts.Content: I have access to all medical information via a patient portal much like MyChart. Also use a weekly spreadsheet to track taking my medications, document when meds are ordered and note any questions for upcoming visits. At the appointment use the sheet for that week to document any significant information from the discussion with the nurse or doctor . Then check the notes against the Dr notes on the portal after the appointment. If there is any difference between my notes and the Dr's I use the portal to communicate with the nurse for clarification. Here is a discussion with various methods https://www.inspire.com/groups/living-with-pulmonary-fibrosis/di... Edited December 11, 2018 at 12:08 pm
Posts.Title: Mastering your medical paperwork: Tips from a professional organizer
